jobDescription: Job Title: Data Analyst with Data Munging - San Francisco, CA Job Description:Business Systems ConsultantAdvantage is the preferred vendor for our major banking customer in San Francisco - Excellent opportunity to bring and expand proven Business Analysis/Business Systems experience in a large enterprise server and application technology environment.Critical skills: Must Have!Some Lead experienceExperience in Data Munging, report generation, vulnerability fixingAdvanced Excel skillsBasic PythonRequired:Advanced use Excel / Pivot Tables and Formula fluency7+ years of experience in business systems analysis and/or design.Rudimentary Python (or working knowledge of other scripting language).Familiarity with SDLC, Version Control, & Change Management processes.Helpful:Working knowledge of PythonFamiliarity with common enterprise server applications and programs like Java, C++, WebLogic, WebSphere, Apache Tomcat Windows OS, RHEL Qualys Vulnerability Management5+ years in large scale, fortune 500 enterprise technology organization.Description: Successful candidate will develop operational processes for onboarding & managing recurring data feeds into custom developed web application. Perform data analysis, rationalization & prototype new data feeds. Identify & document business requirements for application enhancements necessary to support new feeds. Act as a lead within team. Required strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.  Acts as a liaison between client area and technical organization by planning, conducting, and directing the analysis of highly complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Provides technical assistance in identifying, evaluating, and developing systems and procedures that are cost effective and meet business requirements. Works with user groups to provide training, resolve questions, assess user needs, and recommend changes. Prepares specifications for system changes. Recommends and initiates systems testing. Acts as an internal consultant within technology and business groups by using quality tools and process definition/improvement to re-engineer technical processes for greater efficiencies. Provides direction and guidance to less experienced staff.
